question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about the Consequences of Migration?
  1. Migration of large number of people to cities in search of employment leads to an excessive burden on the social
    infrastructure there.
  2. Overcrowding in the cities leads not only to a low quality of life but also social evils like high crime rate.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Migration of large number of people to cities in search of employment leads to an excessive burden on the social infrastructure there. This has a direct bearing on not only the quality of life of the migrants but also the existing population in the cities. Development of squatter settlements is directly related to migration of large number of people to cities. Overcrowding in the cities leads not only to a low quality of life but also social evils like high crime rate.
